text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello i'm meghna a cloud support
engineer here at the aws office in
dallas
today i'm going to show you how you can
integrate amazon connect with zendesk so
let's get started after logging into the
aws management console navigate to the
amazon connect console
under instance alias choose your
instances alias on the overview pane
copy the access url for your instance
you will need it later in this setup now
install amazon connect for the zendesk
app
sign in to your zendesk account because
we are already logged in we'll install
amazon connect for the zendesk app to do
that choose the gear icon and go to the
admin center
choose marketplace
on the marketplace page search for
amazon connect
choose amazon connect
and then choose install in the app
installation dialog be sure that your
zendesk account is selected and then
choose install in the installation page
under the amazon connect directory
settings login url paste the url that
you copied earlier
enter your aws region
for default entry point phone number
enter a number
for the contact flow attribute
containing zendesk ticket number note
that the value is the zendesk ticket
you'll use this value later in this
setup you can configure other settings
based on your business requirements now
or can do this later after installation
for this setup we will leave them as
they are and then choose install
our setup from the zendesk side is
completed now let's configure the
required setup from the amazon connect
site navigate to amazon connect console
choose approved origins from left
navigation pane
choose add domain enter the domain url
and then choose add
you can get this information by
selecting the amazon connect app icon at
the top right corner in zendesk
both the urls must be allow listed
now the setup is complete from the
amazon connect side as well
now let's test the integration
login to amazon connect the amazon
connect contact center opens in a new
tab
go to the zendesk app note that it shows
the amazon connect icon at the top right
corner
choose that icon to view the amazon
connect control panel or ccp load in
zendesk
this step confirms that integration is
complete
you can choose the change status drop
down list to see what amazon connect
login is used to load the ccp
an optional step in this integration is
to create a contact flow that creates
zendesk tickets based on the information
collected from the customer to do this
let's first create a contact flow log
into amazon connect dashboard
on the contact center console go to
routing and then choose contact flows
choose create contact flow
enter a name for the contact flow and
then choose save under interact select
store customer input block and then drag
it to the designer
choose the block a menu appears under
prompt select text to speech
enter the text asking customer for input
such as the zendesk ticket number
for this setup let's leave the rest of
the settings as they are you can
configure them later
for this setup we won't check the
encrypt entry option under customer
input however it is a best practice to
set this option in your production
environment
choose save
from the menu on contact flow designer
select set and then drag the set contact
attributes block to the designer
choose the block to open a menu
under attributes to save choose use
attribute and then
type system
and attribute stored customer input
set the destination key as zendesk
ticket
now choose save
drag and drop the set working queue and
the transfer to cue blocks on the
designer
now let's open set working queue
select the queue where we want the calls
to go and then choose save
to end this contact flow from terminate
or transfer menu select disconnect block
from designer let's connect these blocks
then choose save and publish the flow
now attach the flow to call center phone
number in amazon connect for this let's
navigate to the phone numbers tab
all calls to this number will now go
through this contact flow
save the input from the customer and
then create a ticket in zendesk using
that information
so now you know how to integrate amazon
connect with zendesk
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at aws
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
you
